name: Save the prince (Antoniottero)
description:
Gather four different ingredients and brew a potion to cure the prince!
But something could go wrong...

Save the prince is a pixel art open world platform with four different endings;
it features a crafting mechanic, a quiz, a puzzle section and a few parkour parts.

Made in two weeks for the gamejam https://itch.io/jam/my-first-game-jam-summer-2022.

CONTROLS:
- move with wasd or the arrow keys
- jump with the spacebar
- open your inventory with tab

note: I haven't tried out the mac and the linux builds, so I can't be 100% sure they works. Hope so!
